price: 3. Tozali koyebisa yo masolo ma kitoko maye tokitisaki kurani eye epai nayo, mpe ata soki ozalaka liboso na yango o kati ya baye bazangaki bokebi.
arabic: نَحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka aḥsana al-qaṣaṣi bimā awḥaynā ilayka hādhā al-qur'āna wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghāfilīna
